title: On Conformant Planning and Model-Checking of $\exists^*\forall^*$ Hyperproperties
summary: We study the connection of two problems within the planning and verification community: Conformant planning and model-checking of hyperproperties. Conformant planning is the task of finding a sequential plan that achieves a given objective independent of non-deterministic action effects during the plan's execution.
